articles.title: Marcel Breuer’s modernist Wellfleet summer cottage was brought back to life and opened to the public
articles.description:
The Cape Cod Modern House Trust purchased the architect’s decaying 1949 house and restored it to its former glory.

The post Marcel Breuer’s modernist Wellfleet summer cottage was brought back to life and opened to the public appeared first on Boston.com.
